title: The Circle’s Beth and Jack finally kiss after flirting for days and we’re living for it
text:
Beth and Jack share a kiss on The Circle (Picture: Channel 4)

Love has blossomed on The Circle, as Beth and Jack share a kiss on tonight’s episode.

The pair made Circle history as they became the first contestants to jointly appear on the Channel 4 show – taking on the role of 62-year-old catfish Joyce when they were both eliminated from the game as solo players.

It seems living together in the same flat has brought them closer together, as they enjoy a passionate kiss in the next instalment.

And we are living for it.

But their new romance isn’t that much of a surprise, as the reality stars have been getting their flirt on even before they met for the first time.

If you cast your minds back to the day Beth and Jack were eliminated, sparks were flying in their private chat, which grew into a full-on flame when they laid eyes on each other for the first time.

The pair have been getting close while playing as ‘Joyce’ (Picture: Channel 4)

After Jack realised he had been catfished, that is…

Advertisement

Advertisement

Viewers have picked up on their tactile antics on the show – as they have been sitting very close together on the sofa.

Flocking to Twitter, one commented: ‘Jack & Beth definitely are together #TheCircle.’

‘Just watched episode 16 of #TheCircle and to me, it looks like Jack & Beth look like they are getting really close,’ another posted.

Fans have been begging the pair to get together (Picture: Channel 4)

Getting into the Circle spirit, a fan said: ‘*Circle open a message* Is nobody gonna mention why Jack and Beth are cuddling/holding hands/being in the same bed on #TheCircle?! SEND.’

While many more have begged them to make things official.

‘Am I the only one who really wants Beth and Jack to actually get together in real life?! THEY WOULD BE SUCH A GOOD COUPLE #TheCircle,’ a Twitter user urged.

A viewer added: ‘#Beth & #Jack make such a cute couple! Defo should get together. That is all. #TheCircle @C4TheCircle.’

Is it too soon for the ‘couple goals’ tag to be added to Joyce’s profile?

The Circle continues tonight, at 10pm, on Channel 4.
